suggestions.reasoning: Lower confluence thresholds (20 vs 30, 25 vs 30) to capture missed trades with avg gap of 25.4. Include 'normal' volume since 21.5% of missed trades had high volume, meaning 78.5% were normal/elevated. Implement tiered take profits (1.5%, 3.5%, 5.5%) with partial position exits to reduce early exit losses while maintaining some risk management. Tighter stop loss (-0.8%) given the high compression average (97.9) suggests strong setups that shouldn't need wide stops.

Lower confluence thresholds (20 vs 30 gap, 25 vs 30 score) to capture missed trades with 25.4 avg gap. Include 'normal' volume since only 21.5% of profitable trades had high volume. Implement tiered take-profits (1.5%, 2.5%, 4%) with partial position closes to reduce early exits while protecting gains. Tight 0.8% stop-loss to maintain low drawdown advantage.

The missed trades show avg confluence gap of 25.4 (below your 30 threshold) and only 21.5% had high volume. Lowering confluence requirements and expanding volume criteria should capture more profitable setups. Tiered profit-taking with higher final target addresses early exits, while tight stop-loss maintains risk control given the low max drawdown capacity.
